value.title: Friend or foe? Decoding AI's role in the future of brand control
value.excerpt: How are companies already harnessing the power of AI for brand control? The author delves into the specific ways AI empowers brands to understand their customers, personalize experiences, and safeguard their reputation in the digital age.

value.title: Leveraging an AI-powered Salesforce CRM Will Require Better Data Management
value.excerpt: APAC IT leaders will need to be pragmatic about data management, budgets and roadmaps to deliver AI-powered CRM, says Rimini Street.

value.title: UK And Germany Double Down On Joint AI, Clean Energy R&D Efforts
value.excerpt: The United Kingdom and Germany have turbocharged their collaboration in science, research and innovation with a new series of initiatives.

value.title: The Philosophy Of New AI Tech: With Stephen Wolfram
value.excerpt: Talking about displacement and opportunity with AI, Wolfram discussed a forward-thinking way of looking at AI that might help us to void certain pitfalls in addressing the potential of these tools, such as just following what he called pre-planned agendas, and putting important aspects of research, so to speak, on autopilot.

value.title: Tackling deforestation and forest degradation with AI and remote sensing
value.excerpt: Deforestation and forest degradation are both significant conservation issues. But charities around the world are starting to use advanced technologies, such as AI and remote sensing, to get on top of the challenge.

value.title: New study shows how AI can help us better understand global threats to wildlife
value.excerpt: A new study published in Conservation Biology by the University of Sussex shows how researchers are using AI technology and social media to help identify global threats to wildlife.

value.title: Creatio unveils LLM-powered Copilot for its CRM

value.title: This Startup Says It Can Beat Deepmind’s Gamechanging Protein AI
value.excerpt: Basecamp Research says its software platform can better predict the way proteins behave — not with better algorithms, but with higher-quality data.

value.title: UG Labs raises $7M to infuse conversational AI into games for kids
value.excerpt: UG Labs has raised $7 million in funding to infuse conversational AI and voice interactivity into games for kids.

value.title: State Dept-backed report provides action plan to avoid catastrophic AI risks
value.excerpt: While providing technical details on the risks of AI, the action plan also introduces policy proposals that can help the U.S. and its allies mitigate these risks.

value.title: Elon Musk Gave Himself No Choice but to Open Source His Chatbot Grok
value.excerpt: Elon Musk sued OpenAI for keeping its technology secret. Today he promised to give away his own “truth-seeking” chatbot Grok for free.

value.title: 5 AI Predictions For The Year 2030
value.excerpt: Agents are AI systems that can complete loosely defined tasks: say, planning and booking your upcoming trip. AGI refers to an artificial intelligence system that meets or exceeds human capabilities on every dimension. When people envision the state of AI in 2030, agents and/or AGI are often front and center.

value.title: How does AI support creativity? A marketing perspective
value.excerpt: Some might argue that creativity and AI only go together because leveraging AI for routine work paves the way to being more creative. But it's not as simple as that. AI can play a strategic role in creativity, and James Manderson, SVP of Customer Success at Braze, helps explain how.

value.title: ECS Awarded $190M AI/ML Contract from DEVCOM Army Research Lab
